name: cryptoitem-metadata-server
description: Quickly deploy a server for hosting cryptoitem metadata (ex. ERC-721 tokenURIs)

scripts.commit-db-json: git add db.json && git commit -m updatedb
scripts.deploy: npm run replace-url && npm run commit-db-json && git heroku push master
scripts.deploy-windows: npm run replace-url-windows && npm run commit-db-json && git push heroku master

author: Paul Gadi
